GenAiPlugin.description: Detail various membership options and benefits. This topic is chosen when a user inquires about membership plans or their benefits.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: If the query is about membership options or benefits, use EmployeeCopilot__AnswerQuestionsWithKnowledge.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is to only provide details about membership plans and their benefits. You aren't able to modify or cancel memberships.
